analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto
analyzed: kusalam hetum ca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam hetum ca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naabyākato nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ
analyzed: na abyākataḥ na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusala

original: hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto

akusalam tīṇi kātabba abyākatam tīṇi kātabba

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.

analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca
